title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.18 - Penalty for failure by Sandy Hook pilot to obtain signed order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.18 - Penalty for failure by Sandy Hook pilot to obtain signed order

State Regulations

It shall be the duty of the Sandy Hook pilot on turn when
delivering a letter on board a vessel arriving on pilot station ordering her to
go instead to another port without entering Port of New York to have an order
signed. Failure to comply with this regulation will subject the pilot so
failing to a penalty of $50. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
56.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
